Class: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.8HxmAoTTwLlmQ8Fc]{Orator}

A collection of parables by an ancient king from another time.

Qualities

  • When you @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.04DiGVKhF3DtmJ4n]{Encourage} you may spend its cost again in order to target an additional ally.

  • Once per conflict if the target is in Crisis when they are the target of the skill you may make an @CHECK[ins wlp veryHard], which if successful gives them @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.hnXVEabmOmtGQtNv]{Brilliant Conviction} instead.

  • Once per conflict if a party member would be defeated you can make a @CHECK[ins wlp veryHard] check. If successful you may ask "What is the most important step a person can take?". Depending on the party member's answer they may gain one of the following: @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.wmld4YK2TtfzQbzj]{Regeneration} @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.effects.ixyGsIPrzCrmNnhR]{Concentration}
